testcase.classname: To valid the booking functionality of flipkart application
testcase.name: To vaild the product successfully ordered
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in flipkart homepage...............................passed When The user should click the login button.................................passed And User should enter the valid phone number or email and click request OTP button.passed Then The user should wait for one minutes to enter otp and automatically enter to home page.passed And The user should verify the username in home page........................passed When The user should enter the product name and click search button.........passed And User should verify the relevent products came in the search page........passed Then User click the first product of showed in page and enter the pincode...passed And User click the add to cart button and moved in to the place order page and click it.passed Then User enter the delivery address and click save and deliver here button.passed And User enter email address for order confirmation and click continue button.passed Then User choose to enter the payment details and click place order button..passed And User logout the flipkart application and verify it......................passed
